Write-Up Text: As we gear up for the release of the Federal budget people are glued to their screens waiting to find out what the government has in store for them. Reports state that thousands of individuals could receive a boost in their payments while older JobSeekers are set to receive higher welfare payments compared to their younger counterparts. However the government is facing a tough challenge in balancing spending to take care of Labor's election promises while managing inflation. The increase in the cost of living is reportedly the top priority in the upcoming budget as the Treasurer Jim Chalmers aims to provide suitable economic solutions through the governmentâ€™s decision-making.
